title: They nerfed Sona... again!

embed.description: This is a WORK IN PROGRESS POST - Today' s Patch out but the PBE still down ] After a long break, the PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers!

body:
Sona - Movement speed lowered to 325 from 330
Well yeah, either Riot really hates her or it's a balance change that I'm not goind to understand.
In the last post on s@20, Phreak talked about Zyras movement speed, and let me quote something;

>Malzahar has rather short range. He also has no crowd control unless he's channeling it. I think it's totally fair to give him high move speed for a ranged champion

What do we know about Sona?

* Her Auto-Attack range is as the same as Malzahars
* She has like Malzahar, almost no reliable Crowd-Control (her E is a expection, because it needs to be charged) until level 6
* Though, her ultimate has a higher cooldown than Malzahars and has a much higher Mana cost.

I feel like that Riot begins to contradict themselfs with her nerfs, because she was at first a utility based champion, then the reworked turned her to a poke champion, and with the next nerfs, she becomes ultimate reliant, and will be at the pre-6 phase just a oversized minion that can steal the adcs cs.

Sona's kit is outdated and the only thing to tweak is numbers. She's like GP, not allowed (and rightly so) to be strong early because the kit itself is oppressive.
